parameters.name: AclUuid
parameters.description:
The ID of the access control policy.

To delete an access control policy, you must provide the ID of the policy. You can call the [DescribeControlPolicy](~~138866~~) operation to query the ID.

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description:
The direction of the traffic to which the access control policy applies.

Valid values:

*   **in**: inbound traffic
*   **out**: outbound traffic

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The natural language of the request and response.

Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the traffic.
